DOC.brief_summary: This open-label Phase 1a dose escalation study single-agent OMP-52M51 subject relapse refractory solid tumor . Study include dose escalation phase expansion phase . Subjects assess safety , immunogenicity , pharmacokinetics , biomarkers , efficacy .
